title: permanent suspension - without a reason
body: Today I played a match of league of legends,I had fun,after I dont know 2-3h,I came back,try to login and *boom* , perma-banned,I checked the mail to see how and what and nothing,can someone help me? by any chances I can get unbanned?

replies.body: Everything looks to be alright when I saw your account and ticket history, let me know if you're still having troubles though!
